events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Your resume has been categorized under the engineering team based on your experience with software development and programming languages.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact moving forward.
We completed an initial screening of your qualifications and would like to schedule a technical interview to discuss your experience in greater detail.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview next week on the proposed date and time.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our lead developer for May 10th at 3 PM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your recent projects.
The technical interview was successfully completed. The panel was impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
Your HR interview went well, and you demonstrated a good fit with the team and company values.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the software engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits tailored to your experience.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer and your enthusiasm for joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer, and we are excited to onboard you as a new software engineer with our company.
Your onboarding process has commenced with orientation and access setup to all engineering resources and tools.
The hiring process is officially closed. We welcome you aboard and look forward to your contributions to the engineering team.
